selectionPrompt: Select only peer‑reviewed results, guideline changes, approvals/recalls, or PH advisories with quantified risk/benefit. Skip preprints unless policy‑relevant.
essencePrompt: 3 bullets: 1) Finding/intervention and population, 2) Evidence strength (design, n, effect size), 3) Practical implication and caveat. 60–120 words.
perspectivesPrompt: Three one‑liners: 1) Evidence check, 2) How to apply (who/when), 3) System/patient impact.
